gov.ncbi.pmc.dtdanalyzer

Class Attributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ncbi.pmc.dtdanalyzer.Attributes

  • public class Attributes
extends Object
    Holds a collection of Attribute objects and provides accessor methods
    Author:
    Demian Hess

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Attributes() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAttribute(Attribute attribute)
      Adds Attribute to the collection
      String[] getAllAtttributeNames()
      Returns a list of unique attribute names in the collection
      Attribute getAttribute(String elementName, String attributeName)
      Returns the specified Attribute using the element name and the attribute name; null if no matching attribute is in the collection.
      AttributeIterator getAttributeIterator()
      Returns an iterator of all the Attributes in the collection
      AttributeIterator getAttributesByElementName(String eName)
      Returns all attributes declared for a specific element.
      AttributeIterator getAttributesByName(String aName)
      Returns all attributes that have the specified name.
      boolean hasAttribute(Attribute attribute) 
      boolean hasAttribute(String elementName, String attributeName)
      Indicates whether a specific attribute is in the collection.

    • Method Detail

      • addAttribute

        public void addAttribute(Attribute attribute)
        Adds Attribute to the collection
        Parameters:
        attribute - Attribute to be added

      • getAllAtttributeNames

        public String[] getAllAtttributeNames()
        Returns a list of unique attribute names in the collection
        Returns:
        List of attribute names

      • getAttribute

        public Attribute getAttribute(String elementName,
                     String attributeName)
        Returns the specified Attribute using the element name and the attribute name; null if no matching attribute is in the collection.
        Parameters:
        elementName - Element name
        attributeName - Attribute name
        Returns:
        Matching attribute or null

      • getAttributeIterator

        public AttributeIterator getAttributeIterator()
        Returns an iterator of all the Attributes in the collection
        Returns:
        All attributes in the collection

      • getAttributesByElementName

        public AttributeIterator getAttributesByElementName(String eName)
        Returns all attributes declared for a specific element. Attributes will be packaged in an AttributeIterator. If no attributes are available, the iterator will be empty.
        Parameters:
        eName - Element name
        Returns:
        Iterator containing all matching attributes

      • getAttributesByName

        public AttributeIterator getAttributesByName(String aName)
        Returns all attributes that have the specified name. Note that attributes can be declared with the same name as long as they are located in different elements. Each attribute returned will thus have a different element name.
        Parameters:
        aName - Attribute name
        Returns:
        Iterator containing all matching attributes

      • hasAttribute

        public boolean hasAttribute(Attribute attribute)
        Parameters:
        attribute -
        Returns:

      • hasAttribute

        public boolean hasAttribute(String elementName,
                   String attributeName)
        Indicates whether a specific attribute is in the collection.
        Parameters:
        elementName - Name of the parent element
        attributeName - Name of the attribute
        Returns:
        True if in the collection, false otherwise
